review: Do not buy! Stick to the fire stick-cheaper and I've never had issues. The roku started acting up a week after my 30 day return window. It's to unstable or loose when plugged into the hdmi port and constantly kicks you out of roku and back to the input channel...tried jimming it to make it more stable and tried other hdmi ports on other tvs. NOT worth the money, got the fire stick a month before I got the roku for the bedroom TV and I've never had a problem...just ordered another to replace this piece of junk.
author: Helen

review: The power converter and usb cable that came with the stick did not work. Had to substitute another one. Connected to wifi network and setup stick, but wasn't able to stream any content. Worked when I moved it to a TV closer to the router (from 40 ft away to 3 ft away).

review: Works just as good as our ROKU 3 - using it on 2 extra tv's so it's easy to switch. Cant tell that it's remanufactured!

review: Its hookup was simple because someone knew how to make the instruction manual clear & to the point. Step 1,2,3, done. I am quite pleased.
